## ggpolypath

A `ggplot2` geom for polygons with holes. 

## Example

```{r,eval=FALSE}
library(ggpolypath)
data(maphome)

ggplot(maphome) + aes(x = x_, y = y_, group = branch_, fill = object_) +
  geom_polypath()
```
